description:
Get ready for an epic experience in "Love, Death & Mummies"! You wake up in a post-apocalyptic world as an insatiable zombie, joined by a band of undead where love blossoms in the shadows. Your romance with a zombie is threatened when a special human crosses your path, unleashing jealousy and conflict in a world divided between humans and the undead.

But the story does not end here. In the midst of the fight for survival, an invasion of mummies threatens the city, sparking a war between ancient creatures and the survivors. With stunning settings and an immersive soundtrack, you will embark on a journey full of passion, betrayal and epic battles.

Can a zombie fall in love with a human? Find out as you delve into this exciting story where the bonds of love are intertwined with the shadows of death. Save the city, discover the secrets of the undead and have an unforgettable experience in "Love, Death & Mummies"!
name: Love, Death & Mummies: Zombie Romance Visual Novel
